description: Unique identifier for this GIS-to-asset system field mapping record.
Asset category that this mapping applies to within the fleet/facilities portfolio.
Destination field in the asset/maintenance system to be populated from the mapped GIS attribute.
Optional transformation logic (stored expression/script) applied to GIS data before populating the destination field.
Optional transformation logic applied when deriving values from the asset system; likely used for reverse mapping or computed fields; confirm with SME.
User who created this mapping record.
Timestamp when this mapping record was created.
User who last modified this mapping record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this mapping record.
Source GIS attribute/field name used to supply data for the mapping.
Free-text notes about the mapping rule, usage, or context.
Default label text/template for map display when no specific label is defined; likely controls asset labeling; confirm with SME.
Name of the value domain to apply to this GIS field during mapping (e.g., coded value set); confirm with SME.
Serialized domain definition (e.g., JSON of allowed values/codes) used to validate or translate GIS attribute values.
